mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id, emp_name, d.dept_code, dept_name, getSubCode(position) position FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON (e.dept_code = d.dept_code) WHERE d.dept_code = 'de1004' AND d.com_id = #{comId}

WITH latest_settlement AS ( SELECT item_code, after_quantity, after_price, set_code FROM ( SELECT item_code, after_quantity, after_price, set_code, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY item_code ORDER BY set_code DESC) AS rn FROM settlementdetail ) WHERE rn = 1 )
SELECT i.item_code, i.name, NVL(ls.after_quantity, 0) AS pre_quantity, NVL(ls.after_quantity, 0) * i.price AS pre_price, NVL(SUM(p.quantity), 0) AS pur_quantity, NVL(SUM(od.quantity), 0) AS del_quantity, NVL(SUM(j.ajd_qty), 0) AS adj_quantity, NVL(ls.after_quantity, 0) + NVL(SUM(p.quantity), 0) - NVL(SUM(od.quantity), 0) - NVL(SUM(j.ajd_qty), 0) AS after_quantity, (NVL(ls.after_quantity, 0) + NVL(SUM(p.quantity), 0) - NVL(SUM(od.quantity), 0) - NVL(SUM(j.ajd_qty), 0)) * i.price AS after_price FROM item i LEFT JOIN purchase p ON i.item_code = p.item_code AND TO_CHAR(p.created_date, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') LEFT JOIN outboundDetail od ON i.item_code = od.item_code LEFT JOIN outbound o ON o.out_code = od.out_code AND TO_CHAR(o.created_date, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') LEFT JOIN adjust j ON i.item_code = j.item_code AND TO_CHAR(j.created_date, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') LEFT JOIN settlementdetail sd ON i.item_code = sd.item_code LEFT JOIN latest_settlement ls ON i.item_code = ls.item_code LEFT JOIN settlement s ON s.set_code = sd.set_code AND s.set_code = ls.set_code WHERE i.com_id = #{comId} GROUP BY i.item_code, ls.after_quantity, i.price,i.name ORDER BY i.item_code

INSERT INTO electronic(elec_code, doc_type, pk_code, file_image, created_date, approve_status, req_id, app_id, com_id, proceed_num, dept_code) VALUES (#{elecCode},'dc1004',#{pkCode},#{fileImage},sysdate,#{approveStatus},#{reqId},#{appId},#{comId},#{proceedNum},'de1004')
